settings.title: Impostazioni
settings.MailAuxiliaryUserAccountsEnabled: Allow Users to add other IMAP accounts
settings.ACLs: Send email to involved users of a calendar/address book
settings.Folders: Send email on the creation of a calendar/address book
settings.Email: send email-based alarm on events and tasks
settings.VirtualHost: Make SOGo reachable only from this domain (FQDN)
settings.webAccess: SOGo is available from public network
settings.WOWorkersCount: Number of workers (one per activesync client connected)
settings.SOGoInternalSyncInterval: maximum time in second before to checks after changes
